name: Google People
description: This app integrates with Google People to support various generic and investigative actions

key_json.description: Contents of service account JSON file

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Lists all contacts that are not in a contact group
actions.verbose: This action lists all "Other contacts" which are contacts that are not in another contact group. These contacts are typically automatically created from interactions.

read_mask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to be returned for each person. If not provided, default values will be used

limit.description: Number of contacts to include in the response

resource_name.description: Resource name of the "Other contact" to copy

copy_mask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to be copied into the new contact

actions.description: Lists all contacts and profiles in the user's domain directory

read_mask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to be returned for each person. If not provided, default values will be used

limit.description: Number of responses to include in the response

actions.description: Provides information about a person given account ID

resource_name.description: Resource name of the person to provide info about

person_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to be returned for the person
Comma-separated list of fields to be returned for each person. If not provided, default values will be used

limit.description: Number of connections to include in the response
